entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF VERY LIGHT DRIZZLE AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST 10 TO 15 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN CLEARING
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AND SNOW SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS AROUND 40
CHANCE OF PRECIPITATION 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS AROUND 30
